script_text:
The air is thick with the smell of ozone. LASER GRIDS—                 
             vibrant, humming webs of red light—crisscross the room,                
             shorted out by a bypass module sparking on the floor.                  
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
             JAX (32) and MIRA (28) are waist-deep in chaos. STACKS OF              
             CASH are piled high. Six heavy DUFFEL BAGS sit engorged.               
                                                                                    
             Jax cinches the last bag shut. He checks his watch.                    
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                 Time’s up. The silent alarm just                                   
                 pinged the precinct.                                               
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                       MIRA                                                         
                 Five seconds. I’m wiping the                                       
                 internal loop.                                                     
                                                                                    
             She rips a cable out. The vault door groans.                           
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                                                                                    
                 Move. Now.                                                         
                                                                                    
             Jax swings two bags over his shoulders. They bolt.
description: Jax and Mira are in a bank vault, surrounded by laser grids and stacks of cash. They must escape before the silent alarm is triggered.
continuity_notes: DUFFEL BAGS -> Matches Sc 1 Duffel Bags: Use Scene 1 Duffel Bags | LASER GRIDS -> Matches Sc 3 Laser Grids (Fence): Use Scene 3 Laser Grids (Fence) | LASER GRIDS -> Shorted out: Broken | BYPASS MODULE -> N/A: Sparkling on the floor | CABLE -> Ripped out: Physical change

flags.note: Physical risks like combat and falls; specialized movement (e.g. vaulting)

script_text:
The lobby is a cavern of marble and shadow.                            
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
             AT THE TELLER WINDOW                                                   
                                                                                    
             Jax vaults over the mahogany counter, sliding across the               
             polished wood. He drops the bags on the other side.                    
                                                                                    
             BY THE FRONT DOOR                                                      
                                                                                    
             Mira presses her back against the glass. Outside, blue and             
                                                                                    
             red lights pulse against the rain-slicked pavement.                    
                                                                                    
                       MIRA                                                         
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                 We have a problem. They beat the                                   
                 timer.
description: Jax vaults over mahogany counter, sliding across polished wood.
continuity_notes: Bolt-action rifle -> CATEGORY PROPS: BOLT-ACTION RIFLE (Sc 2): Matches Sc 2 Bolt-Action Rifle | Fence -> CATEGORY BACKGROUND ACTORS: FENCE (Sc 3): Use Scene 1 Fence or note as prop/set dressing | timer -> Broken: They beat the timer. | pavement -> Wetted: Outside, blue and red lights pulse against the rain-slicked pavement.

flags.note: High-complexity environment with rain and blue/red lights outside

script_text:
The lobby is bathed in the strobe-light effect of police               
             cruisers. Jax and Mira crouch behind a marble pillar.                  
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                 On three, we blow the mag-locks.                                   
                                                                                    
             Jax clicks a detonator. BOOM. The glass doors SHATTER.
description: Jax and Mira crouch behind a pillar, waiting to blow the mag-locks.
continuity_notes: glass doors -> PROP REPLICA HANDGUN (Sc 1): Matches Sc 2 Bolt-Action Rifle | marble pillar -> MAHOGANY COUNTER (Sc 2): Use Scene 1 Pavement for consistency | glass doors -> Shattered: BOOM. The glass doors SHATTER.

flags.note: Stunt Coordinator Required due to potential physical risks and combat
Explosives (mag-locks) and detonation involved, Armorer needed

script_text:
Glass crunches under boots. TWENTY BYSTANDERS and POLICE               
             OFFICERS scatter for cover.                                            
                                                                                    
             FIVE VEHICLES dominate the street: FOUR POLICE CRUISERS                
             forming a barricade and a matte-black GETAWAY VAN.                     
                                                                                    
                       OFFICER RIVERA                                               
                                                                                    
                 DROP THE BAGS! HANDS IN THE AIR!                                   
                                                                                    
             Jax hurls a flash-bang. WHITE OUT.                                     
                                                                                    
             AT THE GETAWAY VAN                                                     
                                                                                    
             The side door slides open. Mira tosses her bags in. Jax                
             dives in after her as bullets PING off the armor.                      
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
             The van screeches forward, fishtailing into the night.                 
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                 Told you we’d make the exit.                                       
                                                                                    
                              FADE OUT.
description: Jax and Mira escape in a getaway van, pursued by police.
continuity_notes: BAGS -> Matches Sc 1 Duffel Bags: Use Scene 1 Duffel Bags | GETAWAY VAN -> No exact match found in Reference Catalog; add new item 'Getaway Van' with a note referencing the current scene (Sc 4): Add to Reference Catalog | Glass -> Broken: Glass crunches under boots. | Vehicles (Barricade formed by Police Cruisers) -> None: Four Police Cruisers forming a barricade

flags.note: Physical risks like combat and falls. Jax dives in after Mira as bullets PING off the armor.
